title: A Tour of Go #39 -- should "value" read "index"?
body:
by **macginitie**: 
observed at [http://localhost:3999/#39]

" You can skip the key or value by assigning to _.

If you only want the index, drop the “, value” entirely. "

should it read instead:

" You can skip the key or index by assigning to _.

If you only want the index, drop the “, value” entirely. "
